name: Auto-fix eligible - simple null check bug
description: Missing null check causing NPE should be auto-fixable

input.title: NullPointerException when PDF has no pages
input.body:
## Description
When processing a PDF file that has no pages (corrupted or empty), the library throws a NullPointerException.

## Stack Trace
```
java.lang.NullPointerException
  at org.opendataloader.pdf.PdfProcessor.process(PdfProcessor.java:120)
```

## Expected
Should return an empty result or throw a descriptive exception.

## Environment
- Java 17
- opendataloader-pdf 1.2.0
